title: Billie Piper gives her flirty frock a tomboy edge
title_page: Billie Piper gives her flirty frock a tomboy edge | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's one of the frontrunners for the Best Actress role at the Olivier Awards.
And Billie Piper exuded confidence as she stepped out in style in London on Friday morning, looking radiant as she left the BBC radio studios following an appearance on ex-husband Chris Evans' show.
The 34-year-old star looked incredible in a chic off-duty look, teaming a flirty and feminine frock with some tough, tomboy inspired accessories.

She pulled the look together with a pair of chunky black heels, tying a matching sash around her waist.

The star is set to return to the West End this year with an extended stint in the acclaimed play.
The actress - who split from second husband Laurence Fox last year - and her ex Chris have remained on very good terms since their split, so it comes as no surprise she was a guest on his show.
An 18-year-old Billie married Chris - who is 16 years older than her - in 2001 following only six months of dating, but divorced in 2007.
